EmailTemplate.subject: Want to get a FREE coffee brewer?

NEW <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/_/N-1z0crxh?cmp=EBNEWPRODUCTS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> FREE Shipping*
Sign Up for A Coffee Subscription. Get A FREE Keurig Brewer <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/Account/Logon?ReturnUrl=%2fSubscriptionOrders%2fWizardPage1?cmp=EBCOFFEE19EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Here’s how it works: You select your favourite blend and quantity of coffee, then we deliver it exactly when you want it. Our subscription is easy to set up, simple to manage and means you’ll always have delicious fresh coffee in the office. Start brewing today <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/Account/Logon?ReturnUrl=%2fSubscriptionOrders%2fWizardPage1?cmp=EBCOFFEE19EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT17EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
**This Program Is Eligible Only For Account Holders. Don't Have An Account? Sign Up Today.For this special Free Keurig Brewer promotion, you must commit to purchase a minimum amount of K-cups every month for a 1-year period in order to receive a one-time delivery of a Keurig brewer from the list of available options. You must subscribe by following the steps here <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/Account/Logon?ReturnUrl=%2fSubscriptionOrders%2fWizardPage1]]> to receive the free brewer.
